job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brWhy Apple  brbrbrAt Apple we believe our products begin with our people We have a diverse smart team that drives creative thought By giving the team the resources they need to be leaders in innovation we are also successful at driving precision Through our collaborative process we create memorable experiences for our customers These elements come together to make Apple an amazing environment for motivated people to do the greatest work of their lives Will you help us design the next generation of revolutionary Apple products   Apple is looking for a Software Engineer with cloud services experience to drive design and implementation of a critical and unique customerfacing Apple service This is a rare opportunity to own a new set of servicesmicroservices from the beginning within a team with a noops culturebrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brYou have deep understanding of core CS  including algorithms amp data structures operating systems distributed systems networking and concurrent programmingbrbrWe prefer someone with a minimum of 5 years of experience in software engineering but we are openbrbrYou have experience and insight into designing implementing and supporting highly scalable cloud services from the ground upbrbrYou are a versatile programmer in Go Java PythonbrbrYou are comfortable in working in a dynamic fastgrowing team environmentbrbrYou can thrive in small team environment with minimal documentation and processbrbrYou have phenomenal Aptitude to deal with ambiguity and enthusiasm to help tackle difficult issuesbrbrYou will be collaborating across many participating teams so good interpersonal skills will help you success in this rolebrbrDevOps experience is nice to havebrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brOur team is looking for a technically savvy computer science professional who is able to work autonomously in a small foundational team in an ambiguous rapidly changing environment You should have the strong interpersonal and communication skills to collaborate effectively with other crossfunctional teams and the other mostly nonsoftware members of this team We rely on your technical expertise and experience to help and shape our software and define the workbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBachelors degree in Engineering is required Masters Degree in CS or CE is preferredbrbr brRole Number 200229918brbr
